channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China fires back — for what is says is the last time — by lifting U.S. tariffs to 125%
item.description: China on Friday fired back on tariffs for what it said was the final time.

item.title: Thursday’s stock-market downturn was ‘no big deal,’ says Navarro
item.description: After the highest rise in stock market history, investors should expect “a little pullback,” said President Trump’s senior counselor for trade and man...

item.title: ‘Are we out of our minds?’ My husband and I are in our 70s. Should we use $600K of our savings to buy our dream home?
item.description: “The community has its own gym, tennis courts, restaurants and bars, plus it is a brand-new home.”

item.title: ‘This is not in my tolerance level’: I inherited a $600K portfolio from my father. Should I move it all into bonds?
item.description: Stocks soared on Wednesday after Trump announced a 90-day pause on country-specific “reciprocal” tariffs.

item.title: My grandmother is in her 70s and has $400K in stocks. Is now the time to offload them?
item.description: “I’m not trying to be overly doomsdayish.”

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
